name: Plastic Punch
description:
This prototype was made during the 24h Hackathon at SAEDEVCON in September 2018 and was awarded the winning project for the "Ocean Plastics Pollution" Challenge.

It is by far not a finished product. The purpose is to illustrate the basic concept of the game.

This project tries to raise awarness for:

  • ocean plastics pollution
  • trash reduction
  • recycling

We want to thank the team of SEADEVCON and our challenge mentors!

Best wishes
Les-Lee Dams & Christoph Graf
